item.description: Use-after-free issue could occur due to dangling pointer when generating a frame buffer in OpenGL ES in Snapdragon Compute, Snapdragon Consumer IOT, Snapdragon Industrial IOT, Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Voice & Music in APQ8009, Nicobar, QCM2150, QCS405, Saipan, SDM845, SM8150, SM8250, SXR2130
